LanguageTemplates.Polygon_Begin_Template: there are some procedures need to be finished sequentially
LanguageTemplates.Polygon_End_Template: the above sequential part is finished
LanguageTemplates.BondPlace_Begin_Template: one of the following branches is executed
LanguageTemplates.BondTransition_Begin_Template: the process split into arg parallel branches
LanguageTemplates.Loop_Begin_Template: after above paths are finished, the latter step is repeated
LanguageTemplates.Loop_End_Template: the above loop part is finished
